title: The startup connection file could not be loaded. connectionFilePath cannot be null or empty
author: natenho
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

Opening mRemoteNG the following message is shown:
>---------------------------
>Could not load startup file.
>---------------------------
>The startup connection file could not be loaded.
>
>connectionFilePath cannot be null or empty
>
>In order to prevent data loss, mRemoteNG will now exit.
>---------------------------
>OK   
>---------------------------

## Expected Behavior
mRemote should open in any case. A ...

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet:
Steps to Reproduce: open mRemoteNG with new connection file, close it, delete file, try to open again 

Solution: mRemoteNG will check if file exist, if not start without it

comments.author: poshl9k
comments.snippet: Hi, but how to repair that error? where to fill "connectionFilePath"? or what config to change?

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: in next build i hope it will be option to run app without connection file, so then as usually you may go via file open connection etc..
